title: We need pixel 5 in india, i am a great fan of pixel.please 🙏🙏
content:
This is not fair....😭
Its an humble request from a fan boy 
Dear Google, 
Look i have been waiting for your pixel 4 and 4xl in india suddenly news droped out due to the motion sense sensor i was disappointed but ok. Then i decided to wait for the next launch but now at the launch of pixel 4a there will be no launch of pixel 5 and pixel 4a5G in india but why....? Please 🥺 its a request launch the pixel 5 in india 🙏🙏 i have tried to contact google & pixel team but no response 🤕🤧
